# CAARS Long Version SR/OR

## Load libraries

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
Sys.setenv(JAVA_HOME = "/Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/temurin-11.jdk/Contents/Home")
options(java.parameters = "-Xmx16000m")
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  root.dir = normalizePath("./"),
  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  error = TRUE
)
library(bwu)
library(dplyr)
library(hablar)
library(here)
library(magrittr)
library(readr)
library(rJava)
library(rmarkdown)
library(rmdformats)
library(shiny)
library(tabulizer)
library(tabulizerjars)

```

## Patient

```{r patient}
patient <- params$patient
```

## Test

```{r test}
test <- params$test
```

```{r testname}
test_name <- params$test_name
```

## Upload/attach PDF

```{r file}
file <- params$file
```

## Pages

```{r pages}
pages <- params$pages
```

## Extract table

```{r extract}
plucked_table <- bwu::gpluck_extract_table(
  file = file,
  pages = pages,
  area = area,
  guess = NULL,
  method = "stream",
  output = "matrix"
)
```

# Tidy Tables

## Column names per test/subtest/measure

```{r colnames}
colnames1 <- c("scale")
colnames2 <- c("raw_score")
colnames3 <- c("score")
```

## Pluck individual columns

```{r pluck1}
table1 <- dplyr::as_tibble(plucked_table[[1]])
colnames(table1) <- colnames1
table1 <- dplyr::na_if(table1, "")
table1 <- dplyr::na_if(table1, "NA")
table1 <- dplyr::na_if(table1, "-")
table1 <- dplyr::na_if(table1, "--")
table1 <- dplyr::na_if(table1, "---")
table1 <- dplyr::na_if(table1, "N/A")
```

```{r tb1-rownames}
table1[1, 1] <- c("Inattention/Memory Problems")
table1[2, 1] <- c("Hyperactivity/Restlessness")
table1[3, 1] <- c("Impulsivity/Emotional Lability")
table1[4, 1] <- c("Problems with Self-Concept")
table1[5, 1] <- c("DSM-5 Inattentive Symptoms")
table1[6, 1] <- c("DSM-5 Hyperactive-Impulsive Symptoms")
table1[7, 1] <- c("DSM-5 ADHD Symptoms Total")
table1[8, 1] <- c("ADHD Index")
table1[9, 1] <- c("Inconsistency Index")
table1 <- table1[1:9, ]
```

```{r pluck2}
table2 <- tibble::as_tibble(plucked_table[[2]])
colnames(table2) <- colnames2
table2 <- dplyr::na_if(table2, "")
table2 <- dplyr::na_if(table2, "NA")
table2 <- dplyr::na_if(table2, "-")
table2 <- dplyr::na_if(table2, "--")
table2 <- dplyr::na_if(table2, "---")
table2 <- dplyr::na_if(table2, "N/A")
to_double <- c("raw_score")
table2 <- table2 |> hablar::convert(dbl(all_of(to_double)))
table2 <- table2[1:9, ]
```

```{r pluck3}
table3 <- dplyr::as_tibble(plucked_table[[3]])
colnames(table3) <- colnames3
table3 <- dplyr::na_if(table3, "")
table3 <- dplyr::na_if(table3, "NA")
table3 <- dplyr::na_if(table3, "-")
table3 <- dplyr::na_if(table3, "--")
table3 <- dplyr::na_if(table3, "---")
table3 <- dplyr::na_if(table3, "N/A")
to_double <- c("score")
table3 <- table3 |> hablar::convert(dbl(all_of(to_double)))
table3 <- table3[1:9, ]
```

```{r bind}
table <- dplyr::bind_cols(table1, table2, table3)
```

## Select variables to keep

```{r keep}
keep <- c("scale", "raw_score", "score")
table <- table %>% dplyr::select(all_of(keep))
```

## Mutate columns

```{r mutate}
table <- bwu::gpluck_make_columns(
  table,
  percentile = "",
  range = "",
  ci_95 = "",
  test = params$test,
  test_name = params$test_name,
  domain = "Behavioral/Emotional/Social",
  subdomain = "Attention/Executive",
  narrow = "",
  pass = "",
  verbal = "",
  timed = "",
  test_type = "rating_scale",
  score_type = "t_score",
  description = "",
  result = ""
)
```

## Create percentile

```{r percentile}
table <- table %>%
  dplyr::mutate(z = (score - 50) / 10) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(percentile = trunc(pnorm(z) * 100)) %>%
  dplyr::select(-z)
# caars_sr[1, 4] <- 99
```

## Test score ranges

```{r ranges}
table <- bwu::gpluck_make_score_ranges(table = table, test_type = "npsych_test")
```

## Domains

```{r domain}
table <-
  table |>
  mutate(
    domain = case_when(
      scale == "Inconsistency Index" ~ "Effort/Validity",
      TRUE ~ as.character(domain)
    )
  )
```

## Subdomains

```{r subdomain}
table <-
  table |>
  mutate(
    subdomain = case_when(
      scale == "Inconsistency Index" ~ "Effort/Validity",
      TRUE ~ as.character(subdomain)
    )
  )
```

## Narrow subdomains

```{r narrow}
table <-
  table |>
  mutate(
    narrow = case_when(
      scale == "Inattention/Memory Problems" ~ "Inattention/Memory Problems",
      scale == "Hyperactivity/Restlessness" ~ "Hyperactivity/Restlessness",
      scale == "Impulsivity/Emotional Lability" ~ "Impulsivity/Emotional Lability",
      scale == "Problems with Self-Concept" ~ "Problems with Self-Concept",
      scale == "DSM-5 Inattentive Symptoms" ~ "DSM-5 Inattentive Symptoms",
      scale == "DSM-5 Hyperactive-Impulsive Symptoms" ~ "DSM-5 Hyperactive-Impulsive Symptoms",
      scale == "DSM-5 ADHD Symptoms Total" ~ "DSM-5 ADHD Symptoms Total",
      scale == "ADHD Index" ~ "ADHD Index",
      scale == "Inconsistency Index" ~ "Effort/Validity",
      TRUE ~ as.character(narrow)
    )
  )
```

## Scale descriptions

```{r description}
if (params$test == "caars_sr") {
  table <-
    table |>
    mutate(
      description = case_when(
        scale == "ADHD Index" ~ "composite indicator for identifying individuals 'at-risk' for ADHD",
        scale == "Inattention/Memory Problems" ~ "i.e., trouble concentrating, difficulty planning or completing tasks, forgetfulness, absent-mindedness, being disorganized",
        scale == "Hyperactivity/Restlessness" ~ "i.e., problems with working at the same task for long periods of time, feeling more restless than others seems to be, fidgeting",
        scale == "Impulsivity/Emotional Lability" ~ "i.e., engaging in more impulsive acts than others do, low frustration tolerance, quick and frequent mood changes, feeling easily angered and irritated by people",
        scale == "Problems with Self-Concept" ~ "i.e., poor social relationships, low observer-esteem and observer confidence",
        scale == "DSM-5 Inattentive Symptoms" ~ "i.e., behave in a manner consistent with the Inattentive Presentation of ADHD, described in the DSM-5",
        scale == "DSM-5 Hyperactive-Impulsive Symptoms" ~ "i.e., behave in a manner consistent with the Hyperactive-Impulsive Presentation of ADHD, described in the DSM-5",
        scale == "DSM-5 ADHD Symptoms Total" ~ "i.e., behave in a manner consistent with the DSM-5 diagnostic criteria for Combined Presentation of ADHD",
        scale == "Inconsistency Index" ~ "there may be some inconsistency in the responses",
        TRUE ~ as.character(description)
      )
    )
} else {
  table <-
    table |>
    mutate(
      description = case_when(
        scale == "ADHD Index" ~ "composite indicator for identifying individuals 'at-risk' for ADHD",
        scale == "Inattention/Memory Problems" ~ "i.e., trouble concentrating, difficulty planning or completing tasks, forgetfulness, absent-mindedness, being disorganized (observer)",
        scale == "Hyperactivity/Restlessness" ~ "i.e., problems with working at the same task for long periods of time, feeling more restless than others seems to be, fidgeting (observer)",
        scale == "Impulsivity/Emotional Lability" ~ "i.e., engaging in more impulsive acts than others do, low frustration tolerance, quick and frequent mood changes, feeling easily angered and irritated by people (observer)",
        scale == "Problems with Self-Concept" ~ "i.e., poor social relationships, low observer-esteem and observer confidence (observer)",
        scale == "DSM-5 Inattentive Symptoms" ~ "i.e., behave in a manner consistent with the Inattentive Presentation of ADHD, described in the DSM-5 (observer)",
        scale == "DSM-5 Hyperactive-Impulsive Symptoms" ~ "i.e., behave in a manner consistent with the Hyperactive-Impulsive Presentation of ADHD, described in the DSM-5 (observer)",
        scale == "DSM-5 ADHD Symptoms Total" ~ "i.e., behave in a manner consistent with the DSM-5 diagnostic criteria for Combined Presentation of ADHD (observer)",
        scale == "Inconsistency Index" ~ "there may be some inconsistency in the responses (observer)",
        TRUE ~ as.character(description)
      )
    )
}
```

## Glue results

    table |>
    dplyr::mutate(

          "- {patient}'s {description} based on (ref:his-her)
           self-report fell within the {range} range.\n"

        scale == "Inattention/Memory Problems" ~ glue::glue(

# Finalize and save

## Relocate variables

```{r relocate}
table <- table |> dplyr::relocate(c(raw_score, score, percentile, range, ci_95), .before = test)
```

## Write out csv

```{r write}
readr::write_csv(table, here::here(patient, "csv", paste0(test, ".csv")), col_names = TRUE, na = "")
```
